name: Maintenance Manager
description:
Our client, an international manufacturing company, whose plant is located in the north of the Moscow region, invites candidates for the position of Maintenance Manager.

Responsibilities:

  • Organize and plan maintenance activities so that assets are maintained safely and cost effectively meeting agreed production performance measures
  • Through strong leadership, develop & drive the maintenance strategy, execution plan & program to meet operational requirements
  • Influence the effective implementation of standards and safe working systems within maintenance programs throughout the site.
  • Support the leadership in designing and implementing preventative maintenance and condition monitoring systems.
  • Work with the wider support functions to ensure effective execution of all shutdown and start up activities.
  • Ensure that all planned activities are executed to the required standard and as per the prescribed scheduled frequency
  • Provide support to Shift teams and Technician groups to develop functional engineering skills
  • Ensure effective service is provided through the computerised maintenance monitoring system, SAP experience would be an advantage
  • Drive behaviour and support teams to ensure all major breakdowns/gaps have a clear root cause analysis and that it is completed and communicated effectively
  • Develops positive relationship and drives improvement with key contractors and suppliers
  • Analyse and interpret data on top loss pareto and link to reliability improvement work streams
Requirements:
  • International manufacturing company background
  • Experience in managing Maintenance team in a manufacturing company
  • Preferable experience in maintenance of hydraulics equipment, injection machines , robots and complex equipment
  • Managing Utilities
  • Preventive maintenance planning
  • Cranes maintenance (ГПМ)
  • Dangerous equipment maintenance (ОПО)
  • Suppliers and subcontractors management
  • English – intermediate level and above
Conditions:
  • Salary level: according to market level
  • Relocation package (apartment constant compensation + relocation costs coverage)
  • Medical insurance after trial period
  • Yearly performance based bonus
